This game’s goal is to make a system in which players can quickly create the heroes and villains for a super human roleplaying experience as well as to promote fast and cinematic/comic book style action and stories quickly and without bogging down with rules.

210695.name: Escobar: 1992-1993
210695.description:
Description from the designer:

1992. Pablo Escobar’s ascent in drug trafficking has reached its peak.
His empire has expanded, reaching the USA, saturating the market with Colombian cocaine.
Colombia’s response is the Search Bloc, a Special Operations group.
Each player takes a side in this war, trying to overcome the other, while avoiding the intervention of the USA.

Players will use cards to influence the control of 7 different regions, while controlling asymmetric factions.
Carrying out “orders” that are formed by the juxtaposition of 2 cards, one a destination and the other the actions for that destination.

Pablo will want to produce and sell his cocaine while the Search Bloc will try to stop production and seize some it.

While both sides amass casualties, those of the Search Bloc will eventually lead to the intervention of the USA, which will be one of the challenges of the Search Bloc player, while Pablo needs to get a continuous flow of money to pursue his operations.
Money used to play cards and influence and secure a spot in the political dealings of Colombia.

Will you rewrite history?
Will you stop Pablo’s ascent?

210696.description:
Game description from the publisher:

In 51st State: Scavengers, nothing is lost forever — meaning that you can now search the discard for valuable locations and leverage them for use in your State.

51st State: Scavengers, the first expansion for 51st State: Master Set, is based on the previous 51st State expansion Ruins. This set of fifty cards brings back some favorite cards from the original expansion while introducing new locations to the game as well as a new mechanism.
210696.name: 51st State: Scavengers

210697.name: Cry Havoc: Aftermath
210697.description:
Game description from the publisher:

Cry Havoc: Aftermath expands Cry Havoc with new skills and structures to add even more re-playability to the game. Each faction receives five new skills and three new structures, which nearly doubles the amount of unique abilities in the game.

Additionally, this expansion introduces an alternate game mode that ensures each game lasts for five full rounds. When passing an event token, instead of removing it, new scoring abilities are introduced that allow players even more options to gain victory points.

210699.name: Comparity: Around the World
210699.description:
Comparity is a series of fast-paced, compact board games in which you compare everything in the world, from the heights of famous buildings to the box offices of classic movies.

Statistically, every other fridge in our country is decorated with magnets representing world landmarks — the Eiffel Tower, the Taj Mahal, the Colosseum, Neuschwanstein castle, the Empire State building — even if the fridge’s owner has never left his neighborhood. But now you don’t need a refrigerator to visit famous tourist landmarks! In this edition of board game Comparity, a hundred world-famous buildings, monuments, cathedrals, and even bridges are waiting for you to sort them by height and date of construction.

On your turn, you can place a card in the grid or check if a previous player placed their card correctly. If you check and the placement is correct, you must draw a 2 card, but if it was placed incorrectly then the person who played it must draw 3 cards.

The player who manages to get rid of all their cards first is the winner.

210701.name: Jackal: The Card Game
210701.description: In this game, each player takes on the role of a pirate who is trying to claim the most treasure. In each round of the game, you will land at a new island where you will use your Action Cards to try and reach the treasure before your opponents do. After 10 islands have been visited, the pirates head to the tavern to tally up their gold. Whoever has the most coins wins!

210703.name: Imperial Dragons
210703.description:
From publisher blurb:

The world's most famous fantasy role-playing game has a huge monster book, but many creatures we loved in prior editions were overlooked. The 5e Fiendopedia brings some of these back and updates them for the 5th edition rules.

This PDF includes 5 Imperial Dragons: Forest, Sea, Sky, Sovereign & Underworld. Each dragon is presented in ancient, adult, young, and wyrmling variants.

Each creature gets a full-color image, 5th edition statistics & abilities, and background/ecology information.

210704.name: Ruined Tortoise Temple
210704.description:
From publisher blurb:

This Product is a 48 x 30 inch, full color battlemap of a Ruined Tortoise Temple.

The Product comes with the Square, Hex and No Overlay versions, the Virtual Tabletop Maps (VTT) and a 360 degree view from the centre of the map.

“There are all these corpses with bite marks but I don’t see any predators…”—Stranded Survivor

Ruined Tortoise Temple is a single level exterior map of a ruined temple on a high cliff deep in the jungle with tortoise images embedded into columns, half of them toppled, and a giant tortoise statue.

Ruined Tortoise Temple is intended for fantasy, pulp, horror, modern, or post-apocalyptic games. This could also be used as a location in a science fiction game. Perhaps this is on a planet with a sophont evolved from tortoises. A slow moving, long-lived, highly armored tortoise species with omnivorous tendencies perhaps.

Adventure hook for use with this map:

The Secret of the Tortoise Temple: The player characters are either stranded on an island after a ship crash or are exploring an island (for treasure or for survival reasons such as a need for food, fresh water, timber to repair their wounded ship, ship beached for careening and not much else to do, etc.)

Eventually the group finds their way to the ruined tortoise temple. The group finds a lot of corpses with teeth marks as they explore near the temple. Many tortoises inhabit the island but there are no natural predators. As they approach, the tortoises which had held their distance get closer and closer. If the group enters the temple, they surround the giant center statue, trying to bar their way with a shield made of their armored bodies.

If the group makes it past the tortoises on the outside, they find tortoises inside the shield wall perfectly willing to bite them to prevent them from reaching the statue.

If anyone in the group reaches and touches the statue, the island shakes and sways and the tortoises simply stop fighting them, staring at the one who touched the statue blankly. The rumbling continues to intensify until the island itself seems to rise when a giant tortoise head comes into view staring blankly at the person touching the statue as well. The group is on an island formed on the back of a giant tortoise shell! The person who touched the giant tortoise statue can give orders to the tortoises, even the giant one. The tortoises tried to prevent this mind control from happening again and the awakening of the slumbering tortoise god.

The player character can only maintain control as long as he or she is touching the statue. And everyone has to sleep eventually…

210705.name: Witch Spells VI (3PP)
210705.description:
From publisher blurb:

Echelon Reference Series: Witch Spells is a simple document that collects the witch spell list, and all spells in it, for easy use. The spell lists are broken up by level and school, and the spells of each level are grouped together and organized by name.

This is a subset of the entire book, containing only the 6th-level witch spells.

This is the 3pp+PRD version, containing information from the PRD and select third-party products.

210706.name: Witch Spells VI (PRD)
210706.description:
From publisher blurb:

Echelon Reference Series: Witch Spells is a simple document that collects the witch spell list, and all spells in it, for easy use. The spell lists are broken up by level and school, and the spells of each level are grouped together and organized by name.

This is a subset of the entire book, containing only the 6th-level witch spells.

This is the PRD-Only version, containing information from the PRD.

210707.name: Inquisitor Spells IV (PRD)
210707.description:
From publisher blurb:

Echelon Reference Series: Inquisitor Spells is a simple document that collects the inquisitor spell list, and all spells in it, for easy use. The spell lists are broken up by level and school, and the spells of each level are grouped together and organized by name.

This is a subset of the entire book, containing only the 4th-level inquisitor spells.

This is the PRD-Only version, containing information from the PRD.

210708.name: Inquisitor Spells IV (3PP)
210708.description:
From publisher blurb:

Echelon Reference Series: Inquisitor Spells is a simple document that collects the inquisitor spell list, and all spells in it, for easy use. The spell lists are broken up by level and school, and the spells of each level are grouped together and organized by name.

This is a subset of the entire book, containing only the 4th-level inquisitor spells.

This is the 3pp+PRD version, containing information from the PRD and from select third-party products.

210709.name: Bard Spells III (3PP)
210709.description:
From publisher blurb:

Echelon Reference Series: Bard Spells is a simple document that collects the bard spell list, and all spells in it, for easy use. The spell lists are broken up by level and school, and the spells of each level are grouped together and organized by name.

This is a subset of the entire book, containing only the 3rd-level bard spells.

This is the 3pp+PRD version, containing information from the PRD and from select third-party products.

210710.name: Bard Spells III (PRD)
210710.description:
From publisher blurb:

Echelon Reference Series: Bard Spells is a simple document that collects the bard spell list, and all spells in it, for easy use. The spell lists are broken up by level and school, and the spells of each level are grouped together and organized by name.

This is a subset of the entire book, containing only the 3rd-level bard spells.

This is the PRD-Only version, containing information from the PRD.

210711.name: Ranch Party
210711.description:
Description from the publisher:

Don’t forget the balloon… Ranch Party is a fun tactical puzzle that teaches planning and encourages logical thinking. The task of the players is completing rows and columns of cards presenting farm animals heading for a big birthday party. This is how they collect valuable victory points. However, planning their own moves, they must pay close attention not to make the task easier for their opponents. And the key to success is… the red balloon.


During the game, the excitement grows like in a good action film.
After the game is over, everyone wants to play again. And again. And again…
The rules are easy enough to learn in just a few minutes.
The funny cartoons will cheer every sourpuss up.
The compact box will fit even in a small purse.

rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR3 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Three
210714.name: Blind Faith, Muted Voices Web Enhancement
210714.description:
From the introduction:

This file contains some extras to help improve the experience of playing NMR3-03 Blind Faith, Muted Voices.

User summary:

This item was produced by the module's author, but was privately published as supplemental materials for the adventure. It includes several pieces of original art for use as handouts.

210715.name: Ordeal of the Viper (5e)
210715.description:
From the introduction:

The scenario takes place in the World of Farland, specifically in the "Kingdom of Orland," an occupied kingdom in Southeastern Farland. This adventure is rather specific to the World of Farland, including using the serpent-themed dark elves of Farland as opposed to the normal spider-themed dark elves of other worlds.

User summary:

For 15th - 16th level characters.

210716.name: Mime Control
210716.description:
Description from the publihser:

Mime Control is a fresh and lively twist on classic charades. Short instructions and intense gameplay make this one ideal for parties and energetic groups of friends looking for a few laughs. In the game, players must work together with a partner to get the crowd to guess the four items on the card before the time expires. Only one player sees the card. That player stays out of view to everyone except their partner and acts out the items on the card. The partner mimics every action to try to get the crowd to guess correctly. Points are awarded for correct guesses. Opposing teams get a chance to steal points on each round. Everyone is either acting or guessing on every turn, so there is never any down-time, sitting around twiddling your thumbs.

210717.name: In Yer Face Wrasslin: Board Game
210717.description:
A tabletop Pro-Wrestling match simulation board game.
Two players each take the role of one of nine outrageous and 'In Yer Face' Wrasslers as they face off in a one vs one Wrasslin match.

Wrasslers take turns spending MP to move around the game's box (the Ring) and Attack. Every Wrassler has varying Attack and Defend cards to try and either deal Hurt to an opponent, or avoid taking Hurt themselves. After Attack and Defend cards are revealed, the Attacker rolls a single 6-sided Attack dice to determine if the Attack hit or missed.
Wrasslers can also pay MP to run, climb to the top rope, and brawl outside of the ring, as well as use traditional Wrasslin' weapons like Chairs and Tables to do even more Hurt. Finishers, Taunts, Special cards, and unique Wrassler abilities also feature.

Reduce a Wrassler's Hurt Points low enough, and a player can try to Pin or Submit that Wrassler and win the match!

Tag team matches allow up to 4 players, and 5 different stipulation matches, like the 'Raise the Roof' Ladder match are also included.

210719.name: bOllO
210719.description:
User Summary

bOllO is the simple game in soft colors where you need to show your reaction when moving ball from start to finish.

210720.name: Cards of Cthulhu
210720.description:
User Summary

CARDS OF CTHULHU is the Roguelike Card RPG full of madness.

210721.name: Red Star
210721.description:
From publisher blurb:

Hayersch. The Red Star. Home to a Saldrallan penal colony. Strange emanations from a solar flare struck the planet and granted strange powers to those exposed. Ever the pragmatists, the Saldrallan government wishes to turn these people into weapons. The top-secret program to create super-powered soldiers goes wrong in catastrophic and predictable ways, and now the Union is desperately trying to contain the damage. Those with the Red Power are rebelling against the government, and a secret task force is charged with bringing this threat to an end.

Written by Ryan Macklin [Mythender, Fate Core], Red Star adds some strange powers to the Bulldogs! galaxy, powers gained by the criminals held on a penal planet when a cosmic event occurs. Add these powers to your existing campaign or create an entire campaign focusing on the story of these characters, or the shadowy government agency that hunts them.

210722.name: Project Genom
210722.description:
Project Genom is an open world, non-target sci-fi MMO with an innovative character progression system. Pilot a walking robot, transform your body's DNA, use various kinds of high tech, build spaceships and explore new worlds!

Source: The Game Website.

210723.name: Shards of Azuria
210723.description:
Shards of Azuria is an isometric, craft and build RPG. Create a character and a new world, then start your adventure by waking up in town. You are greeted by the locals of Azuria and begin to find your way around.

Source: The Game Website.

210724.name: WWE 2K17
210724.description:
WWE 2K17 allows fighting in the crowd and backstage areas, seeing the return of these backstage brawls, which is a feature of this game that can be used for matches such as Falls Count Anywhere or any other No Disqualification type matches. The game also features a secondary submission system, similar to the Breaking Point submission system features in earlier games in the series.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WWE_2K17 WWE 2K17]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

210725.name: Slippery When Wet
210725.description:
From publisher blurb:

This is a short scenario for the sleazy space opera RPG Alpha Blue. Celebrity nudes are somewhere on The Network (space internet) and the side who claims them will be the winning side... or something like that.

Want sci-fi but don't want to take it seriously? Play 'Alpha Blue and check out Girls Gone Rogue and Universal Exploits. It also comes with a underwater vessel called The Bearded Clam - map by Glynn Seal.

What else? More random tables! An homage to both Rick and Morty and Freejack, as well as, a new recurring villain named Darth Facepalm!

210726.name: Slaves of Tsathoggua
210726.description:
From publisher blurb:

This is the first adventure creates specifically for Crimson Dragon Slayer, edition 1.11. However, it's compatible with the original Crimson Dragon Slayer RPG and relatively easy to convert to any other fantasy RPG.

There's something in that cave... the cave all those villagers are afraid of. What's inside? Will the adventurers be able to leave once they enter? What does this have to do with Tsathoggua?

Not only is there an awesome canvern map by Glynn Seal and plenty of interesting encounters, but you get several random tables - which is what Venger Satanis does best! These tables can be used over and over again to make this adventure differnet each time, as well as, spicing up virtually any other fantasy RPG.

210727.name: A Green Jewel They Must Possess
210727.description:
From publisher blurb:

This short investigative horror scenario takes its name from the early 80s animated film Heavy Metal. It's an homage to H.P. Lovecraft as is my own investigative horror RPG The Outer Presence.

A green glowing sphere has been found in what was Sumeria. It's both extremely powerful and dangerous. The investigators have a chance to claim it before others can get their hands or tentacles on it.

The vast majority of this adventure is system-neutral and includes a random table of character subplots which will be useful outside this scenario.

210729.name: Rythm 'n' Play
210729.description:
The players will have to "create" some musical score with the help of some cards and following the musical rules. No need to know the music or to sing with Rythm 'n' Play!

Follow the rules of the flat notes or the sharp notes to place the cards you draw. You have to use a Rythm card to draw some Play cards (maximum 4 cards). If during the player's turn the last Play card played is his, he could continue the musical score or win it.

210730.name: Semiramis
210730.description:
From publisher blurb:

Her Name Brings Death

An ancient entity with ancient powers, Semiramis (PL 21) (pronounced "Shamiram”) is survived the Atlantean Wars to eventually become one of the most powerful creatures on Earth. Siphoning the life force of others to sustain her own existence, this being uses her network of devoted mortal worshipers and psychic vampire minions to locate and capture the vitalest of meta children. She waits for them to come into their own powers, then consumes them.

The Shepherd Academy, with all the delicious, young potential hereos, is of particular interest to her insatiable hunger.

Super Powered Legends. Because sometimes what you need is a character everyone will recognize, even if they’ve never met her before.

210731.name: Lunar Knights (Pathfinder)
210731.description:
From publisher blurb:

Fur and Fang, Tooth and Claw!

Everyone knows about lycanthropes, right? They get grumpy in moonlight, dislike silver, and should avoid hickies. What more is there?

Actually there’s a whole world of werebeasts and werecultures, just waiting for you to discover!

Lunar Knights presents a world of shapeshifting options, from campaign options on how to handle lycanthropic curses, variant lycanthropes based on various mythologies, new shapeshifting-themed class features (ranging from the barbarian’s lycanthropic stalker to a sorcerous lycanthropic bloodline), new feats, new forms of lycanthropy, and even lycanthropy-specific prestige classes—including the dire lord, moon priest, and even the lunar knight!

So pack some extra wolvesbane, polish your silver sickle, and get ready for a big dose of the hair of the dog that bit you!

rpgitemversion: High-Level: Descent into Shadow PDF Version 1
Low-Level: Doorway to Darkness PDF Version 1
210732.name: Shadows of the Dread Spiral
rpgseries: CORS - Living Greyhawk Core Special Adventures
210732.description:
A one-Round Living Greyhawk Core Special Adventure

From the introduction:

A tainted soul seeking redemption draws your attentions to the foreboding Yatil Mountains. Within its hidden recesses lies the Forgotten Temple of Tharizdun, and there, a terrible labor lost in time begins anew, as the veil between worlds grows thin, and a threat more perilous than all others reaches out to touch the other side.

This adventure is divided up into two levels of play (low level and high level); each player may only participate in one of them.

A challenging special adventure for characters levels 1 - 15.

210733.name: City of Brass: The Burning Mansion
rpgseries: CORS - Living Greyhawk Core Special Adventures
210733.description:
A one-Round Living Greyhawk Core Special Adventure

From the introduction:

A hero of great renown and her loyal friends have been kidnapped from the Flanaess by a vile efreet Amir and taken to his home in the infamous City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire. Heroes and mercenaries are called upon to liberate those kidnapped before they die a death more horrible than being burned to cinders as slaves of the cruel efreeti. Are you able to face the burning heat of the City of Brass and help a fellow hero?

A 1-round Core Special set in the City of Brass for 1st - 15th level characters.

210734.name: Rise of the Spider Queen
rpgseries: CORS - Living Greyhawk Core Special Adventures
210734.description:
A one-Round Living Greyhawk Core Special Adventure

From the introduction:

Sterich is once more in need of heroes to stand between it and the rising tide of darkness. Humanoid and giant raids boiling out of the Crystalmist Mountains are again increasing in frequency and boldness. Rumors swirling thickly through Istivin’s shadowed streets speak of the malevolent Spider Queen and her resurgent interest in the sunlit lands of the Flanaess.

A one-round core special adventure set in the March of Sterich and the Crystalmist Mountains for characters level 1 - 11.

210735.name: Into White Plume
rpgseries: CORS - Living Greyhawk Core Special Adventures
210735.description:
A one-Round Living Greyhawk Core Special Adventure

From the introduction:

Long a place of legend, tales of White Plume Mountain are well known. Once the lair of the infamous wizard, Keraptis, the threat from this mountain was thought laid low decades ago. Now, though, tremors shake the ground and thick black smoke rising from the mountain’s summit casts a sinister shadow over the surrounding lands. What new evil has arisen under the mountain?

A one-round Core Special adventure set in White Plume Mountain for characters level 1 - 15.

210736.name: Whispers of the Obsidian Citadel
rpgseries: CORS - Living Greyhawk Core Special Adventures
210736.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Core Special Adventure

From the introduction:

People, objects, and even places seem to be shifting in and out of existence in the Yatil’s west of the great city of Mitrik. Chaos seems to be unraveling existence itself and it’s spreading. Seers speak of the ‘Door to Perdition’ but even the gods themselves seem to be silent on exactly what is happening. Great things are afoot and while nations focus their attention on each other it is up to heroes to find out what is going on before it’s to late and all of Oerth burns in the fires perdition forever. This adventure is the 1st part of the final core plot arc for the Living Greyhawk campaign and also concludes the For the Greater Good series.

This adventure is extremely dangerous and should not be undertaken lightly. True heroes are forged in the glowing hot coals of struggle and true heroes it will take to win through this day.

A two-round Core Special adventure set in Veluna and the Yatil Mountains for characters level 5 - 15.

210737.name: Wheels Within Wheels
rpgseries: CORS - Living Greyhawk Core Special Adventures
210737.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Core Special Adventure

From the introduction:

Iuz's magnum opus of power and deception nears its climax. While the gods quake at the consequences of his possible success, the nations of Oerth fight amongst themselves, unaware of what is truly going on in the abode of evil on Oerth. Choose your allies carefully; the fate of Oerth lies in your hands. Part five and the conclusion of Ascension, the final core plot arc for the Living Greyhawk campaign. A two-round Core Special adventure set in the Free City of Greyhawk, Dorakaa, and realms beyond.

This adventure includes untiered encounters.

User summary:

For character levels 12 to 18 (14 - 16 preferred).

210738.name: Under the Boughs
rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR5 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Five
210738.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Metaregional Adventure

From the introduction:

Just what are the Sylvan Elves up to in the Celadon forest and why are they so wary?

An adventure for [character levels] 2 - 12.

210739.name: Natural Enemies
rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR5 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Five
210739.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Environs Metaregional Adventure

From the introduction:

Deep in the heart of the forest, evil festers. The Celadon needs your help. Will you answer the call?

An adventure for [character levels] 4 - 16; part two of the Blight series.

rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR5 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Five
210740.name: Borne Upon an Ill Wind
210740.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Metaregional Adventure

From the introduction:

All is not well in Nyrond. His August Supremacy, Emperor Sewarndt has disrupted more than the life of his own people. From the Pale to the Duchy of Urnst the aftershocks of Sewarndt’s treachery resonate, deep and discordant. A former King now lies deposed and disgraced; a people squirm under the thumb of a tyrant and the drums of war may well begin to beat again. Heroes of exceptional skill must step forth and risk the daggers of intrigue and treachery to learn the truth and right that which was wronged.

For [character levels] 2 - 14.

Part 1 of the Tradewinds series.

210741.name: Charity of Friends
rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR5 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Five
210741.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Metaregional Adventure

From the introduction:

Adventurers hail from all over the Flanaess - the County of Urnst, Duchy of Urnst, Nyrond, the Theocracy of the Pale, and even the Bandit Kingdoms. They die or disappear all over the Flanaess as well. Most of them don't have friends or family who care enough to look for them or even notice that they're gone. But some of them do and the Copperheads were just such an adventuring band. Can you find what happened to them and rescue them or avenge their deaths?

A one-round Living Greyhawk module set in the Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-region.

For [character levels] 8 - 16 or particularly daring [6th level parties].

Part Three of the Blight series.

rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR5 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Five
210742.name: Winds of Change
210742.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Nyrond Metaregional Adventure

From the introduction:

Black Prince Sewarndt may be gone, but his legacy remains. One of his former lieutenants has set up a blockade near the mouth of the Nesser River, keeping critical supplies away from Nyrond’s rebuilding efforts. Can your strike force destroy it? Merchants and war refugees from Nyrond, the Duchy, the County and the Pale are counting on you.

An adventure for characters of [levels] 2 - 16.

rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR5 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Five
210743.name: The Forsaken Valley
210743.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Metaregional Adventure

From the introduction:

Since ancient times, the Phostwood has suffered from the onslaught of a disease that has cursed the Phost trees. Now, like so many of the other nearby forests – the Celadon, the Gamboge, and the Nutherwood – the Phostwood is under a new form of attack. But this time, no blight is to blame. This time it is the trees themselves.

An adventure for [character levels] 10 - 16.

210744.name: Corruption of the Heart
rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR5 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Five
210744.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Metaregional Adventure

From the introduction:

Darkness stalks within the Gamboge forest, leading astray the faithful. Shadows move in the silence, changing the scenery. The strings are pulled, and the music has started; the dance macabre has begun. But will you dance to the tune of the puppeteer, or will you break free, and spin to your own tune?

This is a one-round wilderness-based adventure set within the Gamboge forest; however, parties may find that more is needed than pure wilderness skills.

This adventure supports [character levels] 4 - 16 and is part Four of the Blight Series.

rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR5 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Five
210745.name: Fighting the Headwind
210745.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Metaregional Adventure

From the introduction:

"There is now only one hope of salvation, Pholtus of the Blinding Light. Only those blinded to iniquity and its lures can hope to prevail in these terrible times... Hence, Nyrond must be changed, and we're the men to do it, just as we are the men to root out the evil within these lands which matches the evils of Iuz and Aerdi outside".

As a lightning strike the Franz carries rumor of secession from the north. A territory contested and a name feared. What will become of the spark set to ignite northern Nyrond? Will Woodverge’s countrymen burn under a blinding light?

An adventure for [character levels] 2 – 16.

210746.name: Until Dawn: Rush of Blood
videogamehonor: 2016 Global Game Awards Best Horror Game of the Year Nominee
210746.description:
User Summary

Until Dawn: Rush of Blood is a spin-off.

210748.name: ABACA
210748.description:
ABACA is a game of endless variety. The deck consists of 108 cards. Each card contains either a single letter or a combination of two letters as well as a scoring value. There are five variations of the basic game that can be played: Primary ABACA, ABACA Royal, Argo ABACA, ABACA Rummy and Combination ABACA.

ABACA: Ten cards are dealt to each player. The object of each hand is to try to be the first to use all ten cards to form words. Play is simultaneous and each player uses their cards to form words. After each player has made as many words as possible they discard one unused card and dealer then deals a new card to each player. Cards are exchanged until someone declares ABACA meaning that all ten cards have been used in words.

Primary ABACA: Seven cards are dealt to each player and for each hand, every player places down a card - the winner of the hand is the person with the card closest to the letter "A". Player with the highest number of cards won is the winner.

ABACA Royal: Players add to previously played cards to create a new word.

ARGO ABACA: Players are dealt seven cards. Players will add multiple cards to previously played cards to create words.

ABACA Rummy: Players are dealt seven cards. One card is placed face up. First player takes either face up or top of deck and create as many words as he can in front of him and then discards one card. Play continues and players can pick up any number of cards from discard stack as long as they play the bottom card each time. Play continues until someone has used all their cards.

Combination ABACA: Can be played as game of solitaire or with several players. Shuffle deck and place 25 cards face down in a 5 by 5 grid. The remainder of the deck is placed on the center card. Play begins by turning over any two cards. If they form a word player places cards in their pile and is allowed another turn. If they do not form a word, cards are turned back over and player takes a penalty card from center deck.

210749.name: Zulu Response
210749.description:
Experience realistic combat gameplay from 1879 as you take command of your own squad of AI British soldiers or Zulu warriors.

Source: The Game Website.

210750.name: Razortron 2000
210750.description:
User Summary

Razortron 2000 is a casual infinite racer game, with a 80s vibe.

210751.name: GoNNER
videogamehonor: 2017 IGF Awards Excellence In Audio Winner
210751.description:
GoNNER is a tough as hell procedurally-generated 2D platformer with roguelike elements, following the largely misunderstood and altruistic Ikk on a journey to cheer up his only friend in this world—a giant landbound whale named Sally—by searching for just the right trinket in the deep and dark places nearby.

Source: The Game Website.

210752.name: The Blighted Star
rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR6 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Six
210752.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The Celadon Forest has its share of ruins and mysterious places, but none as strange as the star-shaped castle ruins named Star Haunt. The doom that befell the original occupants is as unknown as the magic and treasures the castle ruins may hold. You have tracked the cause of the Blight to this location and you are certain that they are in the ruins somewhere. Celadon folk give this mysterious place a wide berth, but will you? The “shooting stars” that rain down around it from time to time are the least of the hazards here.

A two-round adventure for [character levels] 6 - 16; part six of the Blight series.

rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR6 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Six
210753.name: Mad Baron of Pikemaster
210753.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Meta-Regional Adventure set in Nyrond and Her Environs

From the introduction:

Baron Fennin Duncombe has long been known to be strange, but his recent behavior has rumor label him outright insane. He has called to him a number of priests of Pholtus to "show him the light". He houses one of former Prince Sewarndt of Nyrond's supporters in his house. To top it all off, he invited a number of nobles to his estate to discuss "issues of importance". Finally, he has offered a great bounty to anyone who can find a local woman. An explosive situation to say the least...

A one-round meta-regional adventure set in the County of Urnst for characters level 1 - 15 not afraid of dabbling in the game of houses.

rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR6 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Six
210754.name: Privilege of the Dead
210754.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Meta-Regional Adventure set in Ratik

From the introduction:

"The pain comes in waves now, almost more than I can bear. My hope is fading, and I don’t know how much longer I can hold on or even if there is any reason for me to keep trying."

A very challenging search and rescue module for players and characters] that are comfortable with leaving what they know behind.

User summary:

For 8th - 16th level characters.

rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR6 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Six
TSS - Living Greyhawk Splintered Suns and Scarlet Signs Meta-Regional Adventures
210755.name: Gift of the Tempest
210755.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Meta-Regional Adventure set in the Splintered Suns

From the introduction:

Taking shelter from a storm in the village of Haudver, the PCs awake to find that more than seaweed is being washed ashore by the tide...

A one-round Meta-regional adventure set in Ratik for characters level 1 - 13.

Part 1 of Terrors of the Deep (not for those with a dislike for the ocean).

User summary:

This "crossover" meta-regional scenario was playable in two regions.

rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR7 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Seven
TSS - Living Greyhawk Splintered Suns and Scarlet Signs Meta-Regional Adventures
210756.name: The Wake of the Tempest
210756.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Environs Meta-Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The good ship Kalandra lies wrecked, victim to the furious storm that cast it onto rocky cliffs, its cargo looted and its secrets revealed. But is that truly the case? What more is to be found in the shattered belly of the sunken ship? Visionary messages would have it that mysteries are yet to be found.

A one-round Nyrond and Environs meta-regional adventure set in Ratik for characters level 1 - 13.

Part 2 of Terrors of the Deep (not for those who hear "run away" in the sea’s song).

User summary:

This "crossover" meta-regional scenario was playable in two regions.

rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR7 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Seven
210757.name: Draconic Dreams
210757.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A letter, a dream, and the promise of a journey: this is how you got involved on a rather unique voyage on the Nyr Dyv. An old worshipper of the Sea Dragon’s dream of his youth may get you involved in more than a simple boat trip. This adventure is not for Asherati characters.

A one-round meta-regional adventure mostly set in the County of Urnst for characters level 4 - 15.

This adventure may run long, especially at higher [levels]. Players and [Dungeon Masters] are encouraged to be well-prepared when running this adventure.

rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR7 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Seven
210758.name: Signs and Portents
210758.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Meta-Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

An ominous letter, from the high priestess of Lydia, draws you to Seltaren. The movements of the stars align in the manner foretold in the prophecy. Murder, and perhaps something even more foul, are at hand.

A one-round Nyrond and Her Environs metaregional adventure for characters levels 3 - 15; set in the Duchy of Urnst city of Seltaren.

rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR7 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Seven
210759.name: Raking Leaves
210759.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Meta-Regional Adventure set in The Rakers

From the introduction:

With primeval darkness gaining power, a set of ancient heretical tomes, long since forgotten, may bring salvation. One set is believed to exist somewhere in The Rakers. It is up to the heroes of the area to find them, retrieve them, and make sure they are not used for evil ends.

A one-round Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-regional adventure set in The Rakers for characters level 2 - 14.

rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR7 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Seven
210760.name: Eye of the Tempest
210760.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

For months rumors have said that an evil fleet sails the Solnor Ocean, preying on ships of all nations and leaving few survivors. The rumors have now been confirmed, and a storm gathers in the form of an armada of the undead. Can a band of brave adventurers sail to a mysterious location and recover a hidden treasure that might avert the coming tempest?

A two-round Nyrond and her Environs meta-region adventure set on the Solnor Ocean for characters level 4 - 16.

Part 3 of Terrors of the Deep (not for those with a dislike for the ocean).

User summary:

This module is nearly identical to ESA7-06/NMR7-06: Eye of the Tempest.

rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR7 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Seven
TSS - Living Greyhawk Splintered Suns and Scarlet Signs Meta-Regional Adventures
210761.name: Eye of the Tempest
210761.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs and Splintered Suns Meta-Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

For months rumors have said that an evil fleet sails the Solnor Ocean, preying on ships of all nations and leaving few survivors. The rumors have now been confirmed, and a storm gathers in the form of an armada of the undead. Can a band of brave adventurers sail to a mysterious location and recover a hidden treasure that might avert the coming tempest?

A two-round Nyrond and her Environs and the Splintered Suns meta-region adventure set on the Solnor Ocean for characters level 4 - 16.

Part 3 of Terrors of the Deep (not for those with a dislike for the ocean).

User summary:

This module is nearly identical to NMR7-06: Eye of the Tempest.

rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR8 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Eight
210762.name: Draconic Schemes
210762.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Nyrond Meta-Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Four years ago, a woodsman of the Gamboge told the tale of how he escaped a green dragon to anyone who would listen. Now, folks from a number of regions are interested in the fate of that dragon. Why are Urnstians so interested in the beast and Nyrondese interested in giving it to them? Schemes are afoot.

A one-round meta-regional adventure set in the Northern Gamboge forest for characters level 2 - 15.

This adventure has a particular interest for members of House Duncombe, the Pale Diplomatic corps and anyone with an interest in the Gamboge Forest.

rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR8 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Eight
210763.name: Heresy's Blood
210763.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs MetaRegional Adventure

From the introduction:

When the church of Lydia puts out a request for adventurers, there should be heroes aplenty to answer the call. After all, with the Canon Apocrypha opened and all that nasty business put behind them, there couldn't possibly be any danger involved in helping them out one last time.

A one round Nyrond and Her Environs meta-regional adventure for characters level 4 – 15.

Characters with the Enmity of Hassirak the Tempter may get what is coming to them...

rpgseries: NMR - Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Her Environs Meta-Regional Adventures
NMR8 - Nyrond and Her Environs Season Eight
210764.name: Heresy's End
210764.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Nyrond and Environs Meta-Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A bottle of wine, a frightened prophetess, a sorority of escorts, and an evil cult – what can they have in common, and what answers may be found in the Canon Apocrypha? Answers may be revealed as an ages old conspiracy reaches its climax.

A two-round Nyrond and Environs meta-regional adventure set across the meta-region for characters level 6 - 15.

210765.name: Bats Outta Hell
boardgamepodcastepisode: 21. Devon Dice Explores Clank! Oceanos and the North sea
210765.description: A game about escaping hell. Gameplay is a combination of fill-in-the-blank cards (for earning more than 1 space of movement per turn), chutes and ladders style board mechanics, and truth or dare. The goal is to make it to the gates of heaven first.

210766.name: Dragon Chase
210766.description:
Escape the Dragon's ice cave with two jewels.
2 to 4 players have to attempt to carry 2 jewels, one at a time along a winding path out of a cave. Rolling a dice will cause you to either move your playing piece which has a jewel balanced atop it a number of spaces along the path or activate a battery operated random moving dragons neck and head. If the dragon doesn't knock a jewels off the top of your movement piece then you continue on the path out of the cave but if the dragon knocks your jewel off your playing piece then you start back at the beginning.
The first player to get 2 jewels out of the cave is the winner.

210767.name: Spider-Man vs. Doc Ock Game
210767.description:
Description from the back of the box:
Get to the clock Tower and attempt to Rescue Mary Jane from Doc Ock. Fail and you might go back to the start. Succeed and you can race to the finnish. But all the other players are now moving Doc Ock hoping to thwart you.

Three dimensional game board with spinner for moving your spiderman around.

210768.name: Ninja War
210768.description:
Issue game of Wargame Japanese History #26.

A card game where players take on the role of ninjas and attempt to complete various missions, ranging from assassinating targets to stealing teaware masterpieces from under the noses of their owners.

Every turn, each player must play a "Mission" card from their hand. Players roll two dice and check that against the difficulty level of the mission (located in the top-right corner of the card).

If a mission is successful and they survive, that mission and its accompanying amount of "legend points" are added to the player's career record. The player with the most points at the end of the game is the winner.

However, other players may assist or interfere with the outcome of missions, so negotiation and strategizing are important aspects of play.

210769.name: 20XX
210769.description:
If you like roguelikes or Mega Man, 20XX is for you!

20XX is a roguelike action platformer that you can play with a friend. Jump and shoot your way through ever-changing levels, collect awesome new powers, and battle mighty bosses in the name of saving the human race maybe!

20XX also features full co-op. Play with a friend on the couch or over the interwebs!

Source: The Game Website.

210771.name: In The Hole
210771.description:
The game consists of four plastic coated two sided course maps on which there is a table to record the results, 4 pens for this purpose and a special board in which are set ten spinners. Each spinner is marked for the purpose it is to be used e.g. "Tee Shot", "Putting", "Greenside Bunker" etc. and each is at the centre of a number of possible results.
Starting with the appropriate Tee Shot spinner, one spins it, notes the result, which tells one where one has got to and what situation one is in, thus defining which spinner is to be used next. This continues until one finishes the hole when the result is recorded and so one, hole after hole.
The winner is as in golf.

210772.name: Zombie Boom
210772.description:
User Summary

You place bombs to blast zombie items off the screen.

210773.name: Through Abandoned
210773.description:
User Summary

Solve puzzles using deduction and objects found in the game. The plot has you searching for a twin brother lost among the sprawling buildings and parallel dimensions. An indie game, it was self-published and self-developed by Igor Krutov (Krutovig).

210774.name: Through Abandoned 2:  The Forest
210774.description:
User Summary

In this sequel, you navigate through the sprawling world of Abandoned, specifically the Forest section of the Ordered, using items and logic to solve puzzles. Again, you are seeking to find your twin brother, who has left clues and aids for you.

210776.name: Red Risk
210776.description:
User Summary

This tournament game has you playing one of four characters against an array of enemies starting with infected zombie-like foes. You must eat, drink, get ammo. and build up your health in order to survive; each of which is offered a one credit bump after every round.

210777.name: Undermountain Adventures Character Creation Guide
rpgcategory: Non-Rankable Item (item will not show in the rankings)
210777.description:
From the introduction:

Undermountain Adventures is a new RPGA Dungeons & Dragons mini-campaign that allows you to create your own character to explore several areas in the Expedition to Undermountain adventure, available at your local hobby retail store or bookstore. Just get together with some fellow players, find a Dungeon Master that is at least a Herald-level judge with the RPGA, and have fun!

User summary:

This guide presents the requirements and restrictions that must be observed to create an RPGA-legal character for play in the mini-campaign.

210778.name: Undermountain Adventures: Crypt of Yeldoon Adaptation
210778.description:
From the introduction:

Your group makes its way toward a forgotten back alley in the grand city of Waterdeep, a metropolis of wonder situated on the Sword Coast. You’re looking for the Ghost Gate, supposedly a portal to the most infamous dungeon in all of Faerûn – Undermountain.

User summary:

This adventure guide adapted the commercially published Expedition to Undermountain to RPGA convention/tournament timed play. The commercial module is required to use this product. Characters are assumed to be of 3rd level, and for RPGA play must conform to guidelines given in Undermountain Adventures Character Creation Guide.

210779.name: Undermountain Adventures: Belkram's Tomb Adaptation
210779.description:
From the introduction:

About a tenday ago, the hamlet of Spiderhaven, deep in the dark caverns of Undermountain, was set free of its merciless overlords, the drow of House Tanor’Thal. A force sent by the Lords of Waterdeep now occupies the community, planning its withdrawal to the surface within a few days.

User summary:

This adventure guide adapted the commercially published Expedition to Undermountain to RPGA convention/tournament timed play. The commercial module is required to use this product. Characters are assumed to be of 4th level, and for RPGA play must conform to guidelines given in Undermountain Adventures Character Creation Guide.

210780.name: Undermountain Adventures: The Citadel Adaptation
210780.description:
From the introduction:

Yesterday, you were visited by a devout dwarf named Gyudd. He explained to you that he was an heir to the lost throne of Clan Melairkyn, a direct descendant of its last ruler, King Melair IV. He told you of strange dreams he was having of late – dreams of a plain black crown bearing a blood-red gem. They have become more frequent and more vivid as he’s traveled closer to Belkram’s Fall, his old clan’s fallen ancestral home. He has taken these dreams to mean that obtaining the crown is the key to resurrecting his clan and possibly rebuilding the lost citadel in Belkram’s Fall.

User summary:

This adventure guide adapted the commercially published Expedition to Undermountain to RPGA convention/tournament timed play. The commercial module is required to use this product. Characters are assumed to be of 4th level, and for RPGA play must conform to guidelines given in Undermountain Adventures Character Creation Guide.

210781.name: Undermountain Adventures: The River Sargauth
210781.description:
From the introduction:

Spiderhaven, a subterranean barter-town along the River Sargauth, has been overrun with drow, and the Lords of Waterdeep are asking for your help in dealing with the problem. Are you up to the challenge?

A one-round special adventure set in Undermountain for 4th level characters.

User summary:

This adventure guide adapted the commercially published Expedition to Undermountain to RPGA convention/tournament timed play. The commercial module is required to use this product. Characters are assumed to be of 4th level, and for RPGA play must conform to guidelines given in Undermountain Adventures Character Creation Guide.

210782.name: NOD (Issue 30 - Oct 2016)
rpg: Blood & Treasure Fantasy Role Playing Game
210782.description:
From publisher blurb:

NOD's 30th issue introduces its first hex crawl written for the Bloody Basic system and set in the world of Namera. In the "Undiscovered Country", adventurers will explore a strange land created by the uber-powerful celestials. Tangle with klaxons and morlocks and seek the celestial's powerful matrix!

You might also enjoy a Grit & Vigor haunted house mystery, "The Nine Deaths of Lavender McCoy", where supernatural investigators have to piece together the aforementioned flapper's murder and maybe recover a fortune in stolen moolah.

If heavy metal is more your speed, Sándor Gebei presents some badass fantasy guitars and guitar battles for fantasy games.

This issue also includes a playable unicorn class, some special class abilities that didn't make it into Blood & Treasure 2nd Edition, racial archetypes for creating new fantasy rpg races, the the benefits and pitfalls of fame in fantasy games, divinations from A to Z and some random weird events for medieval faires.

rpgseries: ZEF - Living Greyhawk Zeif Regional Adventures
210783.name: The Player's Guide to Zeif
210783.description:
All the information on the Living Greyhawk region of Zeif you'll ever need.

From the introduction:

This guide is a massive collaboration of the various sources of canon that is available to the region of Zeif in the Living Greyhawk campaign from published sources over the years as well as projects designed and created by the Zeif Triad and their delegates. It is designed as both a means of information centralization as well as a guide and helpful tool for all players wanting to create more flavorful [player characters] for play in the Living Greyhawk Campaign region of Zeif.

210784.name: Noble Estates
210784.description:
From publisher blurb:

A city or portion of town for upper class residents - This upper class part of any city contains 10 detailed locations, 30 adventure hooks, a new monster, and an intelligent magic sword.

210785.name: Journey to the Summit of Mount Gellid
210785.description:
From publisher blurb:

An adventure for 5th level characters attempting to slay a white dragon. - Includes several paths and options for longer play and a new magic item.

Each product has Further Adventure™ hooks to aid in writing follow up quests, and an exclusive spell, monster, item, god, or optional rule that is previously unpublished.

210786.name: Village Shops
210786.description:
From publisher blurb:

5 sample shops suitable for a village setting - Five example shops, their NPC owners, and contents/prices suitable for any village setting. Includes 15 adventure hooks.

Each product has Further Adventure™ hooks to aid in writing follow up quests, and an exclusive spell, monster, item, god, or optional rule that is previously unpublished.

210787.name: Dungeon Encounters
210787.description:
From publisher blurb:

Our first set of random encounters in a dungeon setting. Comes with 10 encounters, 30 adventure hooks, and a new potion.

210788.name: Rules of the Joust
210788.description:
From publisher blurb:

An alternate game mechanic - detailing the Rules of the Joust! Runs and tips to hold a formal tourney.

210789.name: Fane of Madness
210789.description:
From publisher blurb:

A short dungeon adventure for four fifth-level players - A cave-in leads your party into a side quest suitable for any Urban/Town setting. Comes with 3 adventure hooks, a new magic item, and a new monster - the skeletal guardian.

210790.name: Orc Hordes
210790.description:
From publisher blurb:

10 encounters with an invading Orc Army - Our first set of random encounters set during an invasion of the Orc Hordes. Comes with 10 encounters, 30 adventure hooks, and a new potion.

210791.name: Living Dungeon World
rpgcategory: Non-Rankable Item (item will not show in the rankings)
210791.description:
From the introduction:

Welcome to Living Dungeon World! This is a modification and add-on to the Dungeon World roleplaying game, specifically tailored for playing persistent characters in ongoing convention sessions.

User summary:

This is a general process to allow for continuity of play with a character across various convention play sessions. The intent of the document is to enable persistent play modeled after the "Living Greyhawk" organized play experience.

N.B. this is a fan-created document and process.

210792.name: Hocus & Pocus
210792.description:
From publisher blurb:

Hocus & Pocus

Ashley Rahner and Matthew Dickerson found themselves on hard times, and circumstances conspired to lead them to a life of crime. Thanks to their talents as stage magicians, illusionists, and liars, they are particularly well-suited to their new criminal careers.

210793.name: Secrets of the Witchkind
210793.description:
From publisher blurb:

EVERYTHING THEY DO IS MAGIC!

Secrets of the Witchkind presents everything you need to bring a new, highly magical player character race to at d20 System campagin setting you enjoy. The Witchkind aren't just spellcasters... everything they are is tied to magic, and they use it more naturally than any other beings in the multiverse. Get to know them and play them with this OGL supplement for d20 Miodern (but easily adaptable to any d20 System game) that contains rules for creating Witchkind player characters, details on their unique spellcasting methods, and 17 feats and 6 talent trees to augment and expand their magical abilities.

Like Secrets of the Immortals, this product was inspired by and loosely based on a classic television series. If you've ever thought the story of an average guy who marries a witch and has to deal with the culture shock that is her family, this book is the perfect starting point. It's also the perfect tool if you want to bring a looser spellcasting system that more resembles those found in books and movies to the d20 System.

210794.name: Tiny Elementals
210794.description:
From publisher blurb:

In the maelstrom of the Elemental Planes, even the tiny can thrive…

The Elemental Planes of Air, Earth, Fire and Water are primal planes of pulsating energies, little understood but greedily exploited by wizards and would-be rulers of the multiverses. The hierarchies of beings there are dangerous and useful to mortals, but what of the sentient crumbs of elemental life, who slip in and out of the cracks of the walls between dimensions? The erkunae, decadent inhabitants of the strange isle of Erkusaa, divide their chaotic society into castes by enslaving tiny elementals, and summoners of the elementals think they can prosper by bringing hordes of these crude little motes of energy/matter across the dimensional line- but they might be surprised by the power of Tiny Elementals! A new Purple Duck Storeroom investigation of these pint-sized outsiders of air, earth, fire and water gives you the lowdown on their quirks and stats, and how they fit into the Patchwork Planet of Porphyra! Get Purple Duck Storeroom: Tiny Elementals today from the sadistic summoners at Purple Duck Games, where our games are what you want!

210795.name: Wizards & Wiseguys: Public Enemies
210795.description:
From publisher blurb:

In this rollicking alt-history adventure for Savage Worlds, magic is awakened in the early 20th Century.

In 1920, at the same time alcohol was banned, a Prohibition against Sorcery was passed by the US Congress. The law deported all denizens of Faerie out of the country and prohibited the practice of magic for any reason other than law enforcement or national defense. Spell books and magic items were burned in the streets and all known portals to Faerie were sealed.

But when sorcery is outlawed, only outlaws will be sorcerers...

In this pick-up adventure, the players take on the roles of romanticized Depression Era bandits in the mold of John Dillinger or Bonnie and Clyde.

The public sees them as modern-day, spell-slinging Robin Hoods for taking on the banks that have foreclosed on so many. Despite the adulation they enjoy as folk heroes, it's a dangerous life as they prowl the Midwestern country roads looking for their next score. The FBI's wizards (and the dark magic they wield) are never too far behind...

Note - This adventure is set in the same universe as Kaiser's Gate. In order to make this adventure easier to use for a quick pick-up game - it uses the standard magic system for Savage Worlds. Kaiser's Gate is not required to enjoy this adventure. But it's pretty awesome and if you like alt-history in your Savage Worlds fun, you should pick it up. With a little conversion this adventure can be used with Kaiser's Gate.

This adventure includes pregenerated PCs to make it easier to use as a quick pickup adventure.

210796.name: Sanctuary of Belches
210796.description:
From publisher blurb:

A Distant Horn across the Ice…

Things are bad in the village of Olsha. Weeks ago, the sound of a monstrous horn began to drift down from the ice hills at all hours of the day and night. Nobody can sleep, everyone’s nerves are frazzled, and the animals are nervous and aggressive. A scout followed the sound to a stone doorway that led into carved halls and caves. A foul smell emanated from the place, and strange belch-like sounds rumbled deep within…

Sanctuary of Belches is a whimsical — and frankly, kind of gross — 5th edition compatible temple delve for four 5th-level characters. The PCs will face cruel northern fey, orcs, duergar, giants, and more. DMs will find four new magic items, and advice on running the adventure in the Midgard Campaign Setting or any fantasy setting that includes giants.

The horn is sounding again, calling to an ancient evil beneath the ice. Hurry, before it rises!

210797.name: DI6DENT (Issue 6 - Sep 2012)
210797.description:
DI6DENT
Nombre 6
Septembre 2012

Le Mook de la culture rôliste et plus si affinités

le JdR, un loisir sous influences?

210799.name: Carcassonne: Bonusplättchen Spiel 2016
210799.description:
This single-tile mini-expansion can be added to any Carcassonne game. The design, however, matches that of the New Edition of Carcassonne (2014).
This promo was given out (for free) when making a purchase at the Hans im Glück booth at Spiel 2016, Essen.

210800.name: BitMaster
210800.description:
User Summary

BitMaster is a dynamic and colorful twin-stick shooter.

210801.name: Hidden Dimensions 3
210801.description:
Hidden Dimensions 3 is a science-fiction themed collectible cards game offering over 500 cards, varied gameplay modes and challenges. Create decks containing spaceships, as well as various structures and actions to support your fleet.

Source: The Game Website.

210802.name: Eventide 2: The Sorcerer's Mirror
210802.description:
Embark on a mystical adventure in a forgotten mountain village ruled by an immortal sorcerer. Can you unravel his secret?

INSPIRED BY ACTUAL SLAVIC LEGENDS!
Explore an enchanted world full of imps, apparitions, magical animals, and other mysterious creatures taken directly from Eastern European folk and fairy tales.

SHAPE THE STORY WITH YOUR CHOICES!
The decisions you make will influence the fate of characters and the end of the game.

Source: The Publisher Website.

210803.name: PlayStation VR Worlds
210803.description:
User Summary

Go nose to nose with a great white shark, crawl through decaying space hulks, weave between oncoming traffic, survive a futuristic sport or take part in a gritty London gangster thriller.

210804.name: Rollercoaster Dreams
210804.description:
User Summary

Rollercoaster Dreams is an amusement park management game. You can play in your own amusement parks, and amusement parks made by players from all over the world!

210805.name: Ace Banana
210805.description:
User Summary

In the game, players assume the role of a Banana Archer, the world-famous protectors of bananas.

210806.name: SportsBarVR
210806.description:
User Summary

Delight your senses with an immersive and accurate representation of the sport using motion control and real pool physics.

210807.name: EVE: Gunjack
videogamedeveloper: CCP Games / CCP hf (Crowd Control Productions)
videogamepublisher: CCP Games / CCP hf (Crowd Control Productions)
210807.description:
Gunjack is an action-packed arcade shooter built from the ground up for virtual reality. Immerse yourself in a visually stunning sci-fi world of danger and destruction.

Step into the boots of a gunjack, a lone gunner with an impossible job: shoot everything that moves. Jack into your turret, power up your guns, and defend your mining platform from deadly waves of enemy ships determined to blast you and your crew into oblivion.

Source: The Game Website.

210808.name: BlockForm
210808.description:
User Summary

BlockForm is a unique puzzle-platform game where color affects the character's behavior.

210809.name: Chase: Cold Case Investigations – Distant Memories
210809.description:
Chase is based on two detectives, Shounosuke Nanase and Koto Amekura, that are tipped off by an anonymous caller that an explosion five years prior, previously ruled an accident, was purposely set off to mask a murder, leading to a new investigation of the case.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chase%3A_Cold_Case_Investigations_-_Distant_Memories Chase: Cold Case Investigations - Distant Memories]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

210810.name: The Greyhawk Grumbler (Issue 1 - Feb 2008)
210810.description:
The Greyhawk Grumbler
Issue 1
February 2008 / Coldeven CY 598

Harsh Words Disrupt Oligarchy Meeting

210811.name: The Greyhawk Grumbler (Issue 2 - Apr 2008)
210811.description:
The Greyhawk Grumbler
Issue 2
April 2008 / Wealsun CY 598

Paladin Released to Appease Angry Masses

210812.name: The Greyhawk Grumbler (Issue 3 - Jun 2008)
210812.description:
The Greyhawk Grumbler
Issue 3
June 2008 / Goodmonth CY 598

Deaths Mar Centennial

210813.name: Creepy Clowns
210813.description:
From publisher blurb:

Adolescent Supernatural Mischief in the 1980's!

The Fall Festival is only a few days away. School will be on break, a carnival is in town, and it’s all capped off with Halloween! Unfortunately, there’s always a few bad apples that want to take things too far. Lately, a group of “creepy clowns” have been scaring people in town. Can the kids convince the creepy clowns to cut it out before someone gets hurt? Or worst, before they cancel Halloween?!

210814.description: Promo for Oceanos that adds an additional submarine. The submarine is piloted by Daisy. The submarine functions in the same way as the submarines present in the base game.
210814.name: Oceanos: Daisy Promo Submarine

210816.description:
The Plot Thickens is a storytelling game for quick-thinking, imaginative folks just like you and your friends. The object is to take your hand of story cards, (people, places and things) and lay out the tale of your character, and their fate! You’ll earn plot points for every card you use to build your story, and every time you interweave with other’s narratives.
The storyteller with the most points gets to craft the ending as main character, while the person who connected the most to their cards gets to name the epic as the Author. What will your story be?

The Plot Thickens is a finalist of the Hasbro Gaming Lab 2016 Spring competition
210816.name: The Plot Thickens: Detective Edition

210817.description:
The Plot Thickens is a storytelling game for quick-thinking, imaginative folks just like you and your friends. The object is to take your hand of story cards, (people, places and things) and lay out the tale of your character, and their fate! You’ll earn plot points for every card you use to build your story, and every time you interweave with other’s narratives.
The storyteller with the most points gets to craft the ending as main character, while the person who connected the most to their cards gets to name the epic as the Author. What will your story be?

In the Sci-Fi edition you'll explore strange place, meet weird aliens and blast your way through asteroids!
210817.name: The Plot Thickens: Sci-Fi Edition

210818.description:
The Plot Thickens is a storytelling game for quick-thinking, imaginative folks just like you and your friends. The object is to take your hand of story cards, (people, places and things) and lay out the tale of your character, and their fate! You’ll earn plot points for every card you use to build your story, and every time you interweave with other’s narratives.
The storyteller with the most points gets to craft the ending as main character, while the person who connected the most to their cards gets to name the epic as the Author. What will your story be?

The Romance Edition throws you into your favorite paper back romance novel with muscle bound heroes, Manic Pixie Dream girls and a hooker with a heart of gold!
210818.name: The Plot Thickens: Romance Edition

210819.name: Epica
210819.description:
User Summary

Action platformer game staring a nude woman.

210820.name: Royal Blood
210820.description:
Author summary

YOU are a Royal - half-magic, half-human. You're one of the court cards from the tarot deck - the impetuous Princess of Wands, the calculating Knight of Pentacles, the empire-building Queen of Wands, and so on. You use magic like a brick through the window of the world.

THEY are the Arcane - Death, The Hanged Man, The Devil, The Lovers, The Star. They are reality-bending monsters that wear human skin like a suit.

TONIGHT, before dawn, you are going to corner one of them and take their power for your own in a heist the likes of which the worlds have never seen. The city is going to burn. It's going to be beautiful.

ROYAL BLOOD is a rules-light heist roleplaying game for three or more players and a gamesmaster. To play, you'll need a deck of tarot cards and a handful of coins.

-- from product page
rpgpodcastepisode: 38 – Royal Blood: Let the Heist Begin

210821.name: The Jackbox Party Pack 3
210821.description:
The threequel to the party game phenomenon features FIVE new sense-shattering games!
Quiplash 2 (3-8 players)
The say-anything sequel. Play all new questions or make your own!
Trivia Murder Party (1-8 players)
A deadly quiz show where you match wits with a trivia-obsessed killer.
Guesspionage (2-8 players)
The brain-battering data-mining guessing game.
Tee K.O. (3-8 players)
The t-shirt slugfest where you battle your custom t-shirts to the death!
Fakin’ It (3-6 players)
One of your friends has something to hide in this sneaky game for tricksters.
Play using your phones, tablets, or computers. No extra controllers needed!
All games support up to 10,000 audience members playing along!
Plus tons of NEW features just for streamers! It’s a digital box full of actual fun!
NOTE: The Jackbox Party Pack 3 is in English only.
NOTE: This game is local multiplayer, but can be enjoyed over streams with remote players.

Source: The Developer Website.

210822.name: Idol Hands
210822.description:
User Summary

You are the Blue God whose people oppose the Red God, using your managerial powers to decide who is to be a woodcutter, farmer, metalsmith, priest, or warrior. You also use god-like powers to level the land for settlement, to bring rain for an increase in crops and trees, and also to punish your enemies with lightning, earthquakes, meteor showers, and volcanoes. There are 6 battles in this game with 4 interspersed tutorials, making the game light and probably ported from a mobile version.

rpgseries: YEO - Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventures
210823.name: Masking the Truth
210823.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Adventure

From the introduction:

Evidence has been uncovered of a ruined ancient tomb in the outer reaches of the Hool Marshes. A Yeoman Dustdigger has asked you to assist her in entering the swamp, discovering the tomb, and bringing back a magical mask.

An adventure for characters levels 1 - 6.

rpgseries: YEO - Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventures
210824.name: Throwing Stones
210824.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Adventure

From the introduction:

Politics heats up in the town of Nighford. Two candidates for the office of Grossspokesman are engaged in a bridge building contest to win that position and they both want your help! Who will you support? How far will you go to aid your employer? And what will you do when the race takes an inevitable turn for the worst?

An adventure for characters levels 1 - 6.

rpgseries: YEO - Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventures
210825.name: Blighted Winds
210825.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Adventure

From the introduction:

A strange disease is killing farmers’ crops near the town of Hardwick, and if the disease isn’t stopped, the entire harvest will be ruined. Can the PCs discover the source of the blight and eliminate it before the region is plunged into economic ruin?

A regional adventure for characters level 1 - 6.

210826.name: Rogue Rescue
rpgseries: YEO - Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventures
210826.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A criminal mastermind is seeking political asylum in the Yeomanry from the Hold of the Sea Princes. The Grosspokeswoman of the city of Newick has asked you to meet her at the border and escort her to the city in hopes that she will have valuable information at her disposal. Is her quest for asylum legitimate, or merely a ruse?

User summary:

For 4th - 8th level characters.

210827.name: Colossal Blob
210827.description: Colossal Blob is a fun, 2 to 4 player pick-up-and-play card game for everyone! Playing as a Blob, players must collect growth cards to grow or play attack cards to shrink their opponents. The goal is to become the biggest, baddest, most COLOSSAL blob to win the game!

rpgseries: KEO - Living Greyhawk Keoland Regional Adventures
YEO - Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventures
210828.name: Charting the Course
210828.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The nations of the Yeomanry and Keoland have been divided for years by differing ideologies and past indiscretions. Now, a chance for a renewed relationship exists. But does anyone on either side really want this to happen? What does it take to chart a course through hostile political waters?

User summary:

For 4th - 8th level characters.

rpgseries: YEO - Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventures
210829.name: Cold Blooded
210829.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

In the year that has passed since the discovery of the Tomb of Tchelopotok, a number of other historical finds have been uncovered in its vicinity. However, a team of archaeologists has disappeared deep in the Hool Marshes while exploring the site. Can you find the team before the swamp claims them forever?

An adventure for characters level 4 - 8.

rpgseries: YEO - Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventures
210830.name: Fell Creatures
210830.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

What fell creatures lurk near the halfling town of Mid Fell? What unseen presence guides you to Yondalla temple town? Find the lost treasure of Sagreill Dornish, solve the mystery of Mid Fell, and put to rest an ancient curse.

User summary:

For low-level characters.

rpgseries: YEO - Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventures
210831.name: Stomping Grounds
210831.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Local scouts have reported that an aggressive giant chieftain is planning an attack on an isolated dwarven citadel. Can you substantiate those rumors and get word to the dwarves before it is too late?

An adventure for characters level 3 - 8.

rpgseries: YEO - Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventures
210832.name: Echoes of a Distant Thunder
210832.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The land isn't as quiet as it once was. Rumbles beneath the earth herald the coming of something dark, something terrible. The quiet town of Cottonton in the Iron Wood may be the first to fall. Will the echoes of distant thunder give you warning of what approaches, or will it deafen you to the screams of the dying?

An adventure for characters level 1 - 6.

rpgseries: YEO - Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventures
210833.name: Heir Unapparent
210833.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The town of Jemison is in an uproar. A young man, the heir to a large plot of good farming land, has declared that he will not be seeking citizenship when he reaches the age of majority. Now, he has gone missing as well. Can you discover why the boy, the last in a long line of successful military men in the area, wishes to give up his birthright? Or is the truth, like the heir, unapparent?

An adventure characters level 1 - 8.

210834.name: Grind Zones
210834.description:
User Summary

You are a warrior making your way through a world filled with monsters. You save your progress and level up, gaining new weapons and equipment. This game was generally criticized as being a Unity Asset flip.

rpgseries: YEO - Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventures
210835.name: Fleeing the Scene
210835.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The Yeoman ambassador who stirred so much controversy in Niole Dra has appeared in the town of Granforth. What is his true mission? Can peaceful relations between Keoland and the Yeomanry be preserved?

An adventure for characters level 3 - 8.

User summary:

See also KEO2-01: Fleeing the Scene.

rpgseries: YEO - Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventures
210836.name: Scarlet Waters
210836.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The long ride to Thistledale is nearing its end and you can almost taste "The Rift's" legendary stew. Your little vacation may come to a quick end if the rumors are true about missing fisherman.

An adventure for characters level 3 - 8.

210837.name: Quiz Casino
210837.description:
A trivia game, where up to 6 players discuss possible answers to trivia questions and place bets on answers (yours and/or others), based on bluffing, strategy, tactics, and one of 4 card modifiers (bet, bluff, double bet, pass). The player with the most chips wins.

Content:
Board
134 question cards (804 questions, 3200 possible answers)
Answer Sheet
6 sets of 4 modifier cards
100 betting chips
2 dice
Instructions

210838.name: Giants in the Earth
rpgseries: YEO - Living Greyhawk Yeomanry Regional Adventures
210838.description:
